Quality Education.reason: The course provides "正確觀念及實作經驗" and "理論上了解" in data analysis and programming, directly contributing to quality education for students.
evidence: 建立同學對資料處理及應用的正確觀念及實作經驗
在理論上了解資料處理、資料庫、管理資訊系統等相關議題
對常用的資料處理軟體：EXECEL（試算表）及ACCESS（資料庫管理系統）實務操作練習

gpt_critique.critique: Model B provides clearer linkages to course content; I updated scores for four SDGs where text supports the claims.

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: Practical data skills and programming enhance employability and productivity across industries.

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: Course covers data processing, databases, MIS, system analysis and design—foundational for infrastructure and innovation.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: Information security, privacy, ethics topics link to governance integrity and strong institutions.
